import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import React from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; import { actionCreateBidEvent } from "~/store/bid/action"; function CreateBidPage() { const route = useRouter() const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitProduct = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Bid Event form submitted"); const product_id = route.query.product; const newStartDate = new Date(Date.parse(e.target.start_time.value)).toLocaleString() const newEndDate = new Date(Date.parse(e.target.end_time.value)).toLocaleString() console.log() const bidEvent = { product_id, start_time: newStartDate, end_time: e.target.end_time.value, access_amount: e.target.access_amount.value, minimum_amount: e.target.minimum_amount.value, }; dispatch(actionCreateBidEvent(bidEvent)); }; return (
Back
); } export default CreateBidPage;
